snippet: U.S. stock indexes were mixed. Google surged after reporting strong results, while Chevron and other energy companies followed the price of oil lower.
abstract: Stock market makes only incremental gains to end active week with strong rallies and surges in several sectors.
lead_paragraph: U.S. stock indexes were mixed. Google surged after reporting strong results, while Chevron and other energy companies followed the price of oil lower.

headline.main: Google Shares Soar on Otherwise Quiet End to Active Week
headline.print_headline: Google Shares Soar on Otherwise Quiet End to Active Week
